mapper.select: select pointId, value, measuredDate from MeasuredRawData where measuredDate >= '2022-01-27 09:34:15' and measuredDate <= '2022-02-09 08:27:47'
select pointId, value, measureddate from hyper_measuredrawdata where measureddate >= '2022-01-27 09:34:15' and measureddate <= '2022-02-09 08:27:47'
